datamodel

Class DeliveryRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.DeliveryRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDeliveryRecord, java.io.Serializable, IObserver, ISubject

    public class DeliveryRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDeliveryRecord, java.io.Serializable
    This class provides a concrete implementation of the IDeliveryRecord interface. Composed of a customer class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeliveryRecord()
      Default constructor required for serialisation, builds "empty" object
      DeliveryRecord(Customer owner)
      Constructor setting the owner of this delivery record to the value given and registering this delivery record to observe itself.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addDelivery(Delivery newDelivery)
      Adds a new delivery (consignment) to the list of deliveries for a customer.
      boolean addDeliveryWithCost(Delivery newDelivery, java.lang.Double costPerKg)
      Adds a new delivery (consignment) to the list of deliveries for a customer AND sets the delivery cost per KG to the provided value.
      void clearAll()
      This method clears all delivery entries in this record.
      java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> getDeliveriesByStatus(DeliveryStatus status)
      This method retrieves a list of Delivery objects which have the specified delivery status.
      Delivery getDeliveryAt(int index)
      Retrieves a specific delivery from the records list of Delivery objects.
      int getIndexOfDelivery(Delivery aDelivery)
      Given a Delivery object this method retrieves the index value for the object in this record.
      int getNoOfDeliveries()
      Retrieves the total number of deliveries currently included in this records delivery list.
      Customer getOwner()
      Accessor to retrieve the owner of the delivery record.
      void notifyObservers()
      This method informs all currently registered observers that this subject has changed its state and they need to update as a result.
      java.lang.Boolean registerObserver(IObserver o)
      This method registers a new observer with the subject.
      java.lang.Boolean removeObserver(IObserver o)
      This method removes an object from the list of objects receiving notification of state changes to this subject object.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      void update()
      This method executes when the object receives a notification that the observed subjects state has changed.
      void updateDeliveryStatus(int index, DeliveryStatus newStatus)
      Given the index for a delivery and a delivery status this method updates the delivery at the given index to the given status.

      • getIndexOfDelivery

        public int getIndexOfDelivery(Delivery aDelivery)
        Description copied from interface: IDeliveryRecord
        Given a Delivery object this method retrieves the index value for the object in this record. If the delivery is not included in this records list then -1 is returned.
        Specified by:
        getIndexOfDelivery in interface IDeliveryRecord
        Parameters:
        aDelivery - - Delivery object of which the index is unknown.
        Returns:
        - Integer holding the index of the given Delivery object.

        Returns:
